name: MSR Alpine Spatula
description: Folds easily, even when you have gloves on. It manipulates soufflés, soya burgers, and pancakes much better than a fork or a whittled stick would.Nylon material is lighter than metal, rustproof, and gentle on non-stick cookware coatings.Folds flat for travel, flips out and locks open, switchblade style, for use.
